snippet: New York State officials say they have reached a deal on legislation to require real-time reporting of prescriptions when they are written by doctors and filled by pharmacists.
abstract: New York State officials reach a deal to establish tighter online oversight of prescription drugs in an effort to curb black market in painkillers; measure would make New York the first state to require real-time reporting of prescriptions when they are written by doctors and filled by pharmacists.
lead_paragraph: New York State officials say they have reached a deal on legislation to require real-time reporting of prescriptions when they are written by doctors and filled by pharmacists.

headline.seo: Deal Announced on Reporting of Prescriptions in Real Time
headline.main: Deal Reached on Online Prescription Reporting
